Package control

Class CustomerController

java.lang.Object
control.CustomerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomerController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Customer controller allows user to interact with a customer interface. This includes viewing all customers in a table view and adding customers or updating and deleting selected customers

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      The initialize sets up the customer form with relevant data. It sets and fills out the customer table and a combo boxes. It incorporates a listener for the user to change the country combo box, which sets the division combo box based on that country. It incorporates a listener for the user to select different customers in table, which fills out all field boxes.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - initialize url
      resourceBundle - initialize resource bundle

    • execute

      public void execute(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      Execute allows the user to add, update or delete a customer. The execute button changes its name depending on which tab is selected ("Add", "Update, or "Delete"). When the "Add" button is pressed, it adds a customer to the database and updates the table. When the "Update" button is pressed, it updates the currently selected customer and updates the table. When the "Delete" button is pressed, it deletes the currently selected customer and displays a message with the customer id and name.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - clicking the execute button (Add, Update or Delete)
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception in case sql commands return an error

    • cancel

      public void cancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Cancel brings the user back to the main navigational page.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - clicking the cancel button
      Throws:
      IOException - exception in case of input/output error

    • addTabClicked

      public void addTabClicked(javafx.event.Event event)
      addTabClicked function changes the interface for adding customers. It changes the label of the execute button to say "Add", enables all fields except for the customer id, and clears all fields so the user can easily input a customer to add.
      Parameters:
      event - selecting the "Add" tab

    • updateTabClicked

      public void updateTabClicked(javafx.event.Event event) throws SQLException
      updateTabClicked function changes the interface for updating customers. It changes the label of the execute button to say "Update", enables all fields except for the customer id, anc fills all fields with the selected customer information.
      Parameters:
      event - selecting the "Update" tab
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception in case sql commands return an error

    • deleteTabClicked

      public void deleteTabClicked(javafx.event.Event event) throws SQLException
      deleteTabClicked function changes the interface for deleting customers. It changes the label of the execute button to say "Delete", disables all fields, and fills all fields with the selected customer information.
      Parameters:
      event - selecting the "Delete" tab
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception in case sql commands return an error

    • fillCustomers

      public void fillCustomers() throws SQLException
      The fillCustomers function fills all input fields including text boxes, combo boxes and date pickers for the selected customer.
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception in case sql commands return an error

    • clearCustomers

      public void clearCustomers()
      The clearCustomers function clears all input fields including text boxes, combo boxes and date pickers for the customer.

    • disabledOrEnabled

      public void disabledOrEnabled(Boolean value)
      The disableOrEnable function sets all input fields (except the customer id) as enabled if the input is false, and disabled if the input is true.
      Parameters:
      value - the input of true or false
